You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rsh;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Rsh;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21b1/index.htm U+021B1].
  * `&rsh;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21b1/index.htm U+021B1].
